kDesc
Shirt unbuttoned, rolled up sleeves and a t-shirt. If you were any more laid back, you'd be horizontal. [#Legal]
Chemise ouverte, manches retroussées et T-shirt. Impossible de faire plus cool. [#Legal]
Offenes Hemd mit hochgekrempelten Ärmeln mit T-Shirt. Wenn du noch cooler wärst, würdest du zu Eis erstarren. [#Legal]
Camicia sbottonata, maniche arrotolate e sotto una maglietta. Se ti rilassassi ancora di più, saresti orizzontale. [#Legal]
Camisa desabrochada y arremangada con una camiseta. Look despreocupado total. [#Legal]
袖はまくり、ボタンは閉めずに中にＴシャツ。こんな リラックスした格好ありなの？[#Legal]
앞단추를 풀어 헤친 셔츠, 말아올린 소매와 티셔츠. 조금 더 편안한 스타일로 가면, 아주 누워누울 거예요.[#Legal]
Shirt unbuttoned, rolled up sleeves and a t-shirt. If you were any more laid back, you'd be horizontal. [#Legal]
釦子打開、袖子捲起，配上一件T恤。除非你直接躺平，否則絕不可能比這樣還休閒。 [#Legal]
